87924f81-cefb-447c-90a1-55f5c325fb0b.name: Directional
87924f81-cefb-447c-90a1-55f5c325fb0b.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

8a9fe976-6055-4803-b9d9-43a845e6f477.name: Tough Skin
8a9fe976-6055-4803-b9d9-43a845e6f477.notes: Effects that just require skin contact or a scratch ignore this DR

c9c026d7-5224-495a-bce5-81fb62a1f3c2.name: Partial (@Location, 1 level per -1 Per Hit Modifier, Torso is -10% thus level 1@)

62d2cdd5-bcd5-4222-8b08-29c207db3d89.name: Oxygen Storage
62d2cdd5-bcd5-4222-8b08-29c207db3d89.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

04298824-bcd1-478e-ac12-64a04447762e.name: Oxygen Storage
04298824-bcd1-478e-ac12-64a04447762e.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

1c446012-b0e6-4679-ae85-0cc156e79de7.name: Oxygen Storage
1c446012-b0e6-4679-ae85-0cc156e79de7.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

ccfa5f21-f506-47ce-a322-a6790a549343.name: Oxygen Storage
ccfa5f21-f506-47ce-a322-a6790a549343.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

4ca25cbb-544e-4c4c-8f5d-52f2ef65d4ef.name: Oxygen Storage
4ca25cbb-544e-4c4c-8f5d-52f2ef65d4ef.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

a2d5df93-95cd-4116-b3c1-85a18a7c34ea.name: High Pain Threshold
a2d5df93-95cd-4116-b3c1-85a18a7c34ea.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured

features.situation: on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning

5b81854c-d42c-4556-b99d-2ee63edc871b.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

99a15e43-bba1-4c2e-b640-c355c59f77ee.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

1568fc17-bfdc-44de-9493-cc9da8ccae2f.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

0c941aec-3dc8-4a97-ac9a-d2a44ee80777.name: Indomitable
0c941aec-3dc8-4a97-ac9a-d2a44ee80777.notes: Impossible to influence through ordinary words or actions

266d04c8-ffee-4064-8f1d-bba5ea1bdf03.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

7aa8baa5-3dec-4de2-9823-74269ed69fbe.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

bf025572-6f33-4705-ba06-5cfa1bd1e94b.name: Diffuse
bf025572-6f33-4705-ba06-5cfa1bd1e94b.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

cce9e76a-8094-46cb-81ae-1c5da55e77b4.name: Homogenous
cce9e76a-8094-46cb-81ae-1c5da55e77b4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

ff661624-0184-4433-a450-83de92b8dfa9.name: No Blood
ff661624-0184-4433-a450-83de92b8dfa9.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

b9a96c3b-f812-41c7-bbad-4db78c697f85.name: No Brain
b9a96c3b-f812-41c7-bbad-4db78c697f85.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

3a6122f8-7815-4b95-add0-3bcf48edd165.name: No Eyes
3a6122f8-7815-4b95-add0-3bcf48edd165.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

71514f01-3d5b-4f08-b89f-e69156c986f2.name: No Head
71514f01-3d5b-4f08-b89f-e69156c986f2.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

a910611c-1916-4a2c-9708-cac26a4c3a05.name: No Neck
a910611c-1916-4a2c-9708-cac26a4c3a05.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

1413c073-9ead-43c6-be88-6394da115dee.name: No Vitals
1413c073-9ead-43c6-be88-6394da115dee.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

7fff1e97-0ccc-4a88-ac94-37290cc53bc8.name: Unliving
7fff1e97-0ccc-4a88-ac94-37290cc53bc8.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

04fe8fb7-3287-4417-bfb6-a24679d9e447.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points

bda5a3fa-bc30-4155-a877-fca90c8f2087.name: @Rare: Acceleration, Altitude Sickness, Bends, Seasickness, Space Sickness, Nanomachines, etc.@

ccb94f9b-d3be-4a5f-a363-7f7a756d4a3c.name: +8 to all HT rolls to resist

480627f5-78ad-4fcc-afe6-9dccfe69782e.name: +3 to all HT rolls to resist

27aba44b-e081-4eb6-8772-0aa4b3ed7753.name: Single-Minded
27aba44b-e081-4eb6-8772-0aa4b3ed7753.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

09252870-1f6d-4c56-b0bb-ffc8163aa619.name: Unfazeable
09252870-1f6d-4c56-b0bb-ffc8163aa619.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

8e09de15-0ba8-4e4b-9ae9-c22a49edfc45.name: Hidebound
8e09de15-0ba8-4e4b-9ae9-c22a49edfc45.notes: -2 penalty on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill, all Engineer rolls for new inventions, and all skill rolls made to use the Gadgeteer advantage.

ac7e2d6b-bea4-4f47-91c8-eb925cdfe1a1.name: Incurious
ac7e2d6b-bea4-4f47-91c8-eb925cdfe1a1.notes: Make a self-control roll when confronted with something strange. If you fail, you ignore it!

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident
from others where being tidy or well-groomed would matter
to any Influence roll where being tidy or well-groomed would matter
